title: "The Role of the Dice" - Fudging Rolls

description:
This week the Halflings discuss their most conversational topic ever... is it ever ok to fudge the dice?! When they should and shouldn't be used and, answering the age-old question should one blow on the dice before a big roll or merely shake!
